long_description: A comfort-oriented hybrid for kids, the Diamondback Insight 24 in. bike offers an upright riding position and speedy road efficiency for riding to school or keeping up on weekend rides. Light aluminum frame offers durable performance; the sloped top tube accommodates shorter riders. 14 gears handle all sorts of grades, making easy work of the ups, downs and arounds; chainring guard helps protect clothing from getting caught in the crankset. Shimano Revo twist shifters are easy to use-all kids have to do is twist the grip-integrated shifters to change gears. Linear-pull brakes supply sure stopping power and speed management; brake levers are sized for small hands. The rear derailleur hanger on the Diamondback Insight 24 in. kids' bike can be easily replaced, helping extend the usable life of the frame. Specs are subject to change.
short_description: A comfort-oriented hybrid for kids, the Diamondback Insight 24 in. bike offers an upright riding position and speedy road efficiency for riding to school or keeping up on weekend rides.
